thread.title: [Demo] Impulse! Murder Rocks in this Interactive Visual Novel from NewWestGames
thread.title_full: [Demo] Impulse! Murder Rocks in this Interactive Visual Novel from NewWestGames

author: Kieran Browner
title: [Demo] Impulse! Murder Rocks in this Interactive Visual Novel from NewWestGames
text:
Impulse! is a murder mystery interactive visual novel with an original rock soundtrack. Help Chris and his band collect evidence, and solve the mystery behind the string of recent musician murders. This game is aimed at fans of existing series such as Phoenix Wright and Dangan Ronpa. From working out a motive, to collecting evidence and confronting the suspect, this visual novel truly is interactive. Expect 15 hours of gameplay in the final release!
Release is set for Spring 2016, and happy to provide codes for the full game closer to release. More platforms TBA.
Here is the demo - http://newwestgames.itch.io/impulse
And here is the press kit - http://bit.ly/1jivW0y
Always happy to answer any questions. Thanks! Further information below.
Kieran
NewWestGames
NewWestGames is a brand new indie development studio based in New Westminster, BC, Canada. A one man team, NewWestGames aims to provide unique visual novel style experiences to it's players.
NewWestGames always tries to keep in touch via Twitter, or by streaming on Twitch. So far we've received some awesome feedback through Twitch and our Steam Greenlight campaign, highlights of which can be found in our Press Kit.
Impulse! has been designed with music in mind, featuring a fully original rock music soundtrack, as well as full voice acting for the entire game.
Happy to contribute any additional media & comments for interviews.
